events.message: The customer submitted a claim reporting a car collision that occurred on April 29th causing significant front-end damage.
After review, the claim was categorized under 'Auto Accident' as it involved vehicle damage from a collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case promptly and guide the claimant through the process.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer confirming receipt and next steps to follow.
Customer was asked to provide photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and a repair estimate.
The claimant submitted all requested documentation including photos, police report, and the mechanicâ€™s repair estimate on time.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacting involved parties for the accident details.
Investigation concluded verifying all documents and accident circumstances matched with police and mechanic reports.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the full repair cost and vehicle rental during repair period.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the claim handling speed and the proposed settlement amount.
Following customer agreement, the claim was approved for payment to be processed promptly.
The payment for the approved settlement was issued directly to the repair shop and notified to the customer.
The claim file was formally closed after confirmation that the repairs were completed without further issues.
All documentation and correspondence were archived securely for future reference according to policy.
